医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
探索神经和口颌系统的发育途径和疾病相互作用科学家们讨论了神经系统和口颌系统之间复杂的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Exploring-developmental-pathways-and-disease-interactions-in-nervous-and-stomatognathic-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Exploring-developmental-pathways-and-disease-interactions-in-nervous-and-stomatognathic-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b21796e-baf2-4cb0-baa5-fe3d4b0fbf98 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 04:16:00 -0400 Exploring developmental pathways and disease interactions in nervous and stomatognathic systems
接触健康信息和媒体健康素养如何影响泰国年轻人的水果和蔬菜消费？互联网作为泰国年轻人健康信息来源的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/How-did-exposure-to-health-information-and-media-health-literacy-affect-fruit-and-vegetable-conspiration-among-Thai-青年.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/How-did-exposure-to-health-information-and-media-health-literacy-affect-fruit-and-vegetable-conspiration-among-Thai-青春.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d78f9d7-b0f7-4b1d-ab35-48f86ea650f4 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 04:13:00 -0400 How did exposure to health information and media health literacy affect fruit and vegetable consumption among Thai youth?
生酮饮食对于治疗多囊卵巢综合症有多有效？科学家们讨论了生酮饮食在多囊卵巢综合征治疗中的代谢优势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/How- effective-is-the-keto-diet-for-managing-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/How-efficient-is-the-keto-diet-for-managing-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26abc86c-ece8-4a1d-b07b-0ad60c31bc85 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 04:03:00 -0400 How effective is the keto diet for managing PCOS?
女性酒精摄入量、癌症风险和改变因素之间的关联：吸烟、BMI 和 MHT 相互作用研究人员研究了适量饮酒与特定癌症风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Associations- Between-alcohol-intake-cancer-risk-and-modifying-factors-in-women-smoking-BMI-and-MHT-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Associations- Between-alcohol-intake-cancer-risk-and-modifying-factors-in-women-smoking-BMI-and-MHT-interactions.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b96ba89-be37-4f46-b4c9-a87b407e7d9b Mon, 21 Aug 2023 03:43:00 -0400 Associations between alcohol intake, cancer risk, and modifying factors in women: smoking, BMI, and MHT interactions
突破性项目揭示了精神疾病患者大脑变化的非凡多样性一项突破性项目绘制了近 1,300 名被诊断患有六种不同类型精神疾病的人的大脑变化，揭示了患有重度抑郁症和精神分裂症等疾病的人大脑变化的非凡多样性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Breakthrough-project-reveals-extraordinary-diversity-of-brain-changes-in-people-with-mental-illnesses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Breakthrough-project-reveals-extraordinary-diversity-of-brain-changes-in-people-with-mental-illnesses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=312755fe-7508-4f93-b4b0-43bd2dc2ccb3 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 03:12:00 -0400 Breakthrough project reveals extraordinary diversity of brain changes in people with mental illnesses
伦敦医学实验室正在与 SUS 进行谈判，以帮助削减巴西患者的等候名单巴西的 NHS 相当于 SUS，是世界上最大的政府运营的公共医疗保健系统。它在访问时是免费的，但面临着强劲的需求和不断增加的等待时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/London-Medical-Laboratory-in-talks-with-SUS-to-help-slash-Brazile28099s-patent-waiting-lists.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/London-Medical-Laboratory-in-talks-with-SUS-to-help-slash-Brazile28099s-patent-waiting-lists.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14324f6f-460f-48f3-9eaf-ba2c66489ebb Mon, 21 Aug 2023 03:08:00 -0400 London Medical Laboratory in talks with SUS to help slash Brazil’s patient waiting lists
唾液测试可发现心血管疾病的早期迹象牙周炎是一种涉及牙龈感染的常见口腔健康问题，与心血管疾病有关。研究牙周炎前炎症的科学家发现，唾液中白细胞水平较高所反映的较高炎症与动脉健康状况较差有关，并且即使在表面健康的年轻人群中，心血管疾病的风险也可能较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Saliva-test-could-detect-early-signs-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/Saliva-test-could-detect-early-signs-of-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02a3279d-03ac-4582-b915-c772fadf4330 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 03:05:00 -0400 Saliva test could detect early signs of cardiovascular disease
MedAustron 证明离子疗法治疗颅骨脊索瘤的安全性和有效性MedAustron 离子治疗中心已证明质子和碳离子疗法治疗颅骨脊索瘤（一种位于骨的癌症）的安全性和有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/MedAustron-demonstrates-safety-and-efficacy-of-ion-therapy-for-treating-skull-based-chordomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/MedAustron-demonstrates-safety-and-efficacy-of-ion-therapy-for-treating-skull-based-chordomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=444ba19b-0334-4701-9fb1-2db20e586e61 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 03:00:00 -0400 MedAustron demonstrates safety and efficacy of ion therapy for treating skull based chordomas
评估新假肢技术的家庭试验即将开始巴斯大学正在开发一种手套和臂带，通过触觉反馈为上肢假肢患者提供触觉，独特的家庭试验将在未来几周内开始。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/At-home-trials-set-to-begin-for-evaluating-new-prosthetic-arm-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/At-home-trials-set-to-begin-for-evaluating-new-prosthetic-arm-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fa30bc8-32d0-4719-b3cb-2578eff57507 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 02:50:00 -0400 At-home trials set to begin for evaluating new prosthetic arm technology
新技术将脊髓灰质炎检测时间缩短一半由药品和保健产品监管局 (MHRA) 支持的新研究表明，使用直接分子检测和纳米孔测序 (DDNS) 技术可以将检测脊髓灰质炎的时间缩短一半，支持全球根除脊髓灰质炎并帮助拯救生命的努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-technique-cuts-polio-detection-time-in-half.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230821/New-technique-cuts-polio-detection-time-in-half.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a0a2b7d-c398-4c6a-bc2b-fd160da44601 Mon, 21 Aug 2023 02:49:00 -0400 New technique cuts polio detection time in half
